meanings.definition: The way in which something is interpreted or understood.
meanings.sent1: Her construal of the story was different from mine.
meanings.sent2: His construal of the painting highlighted the use of color.
meanings.sent3: The construal of the cat wearing a hat made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: In her construal of the situation, the office became a jungle.
meanings.sent5: The construal of the math problem as a puzzle helped the students understand it better.

meanings.definition: The act of interpreting or understanding something.
meanings.sent1: The construal of the data required careful analysis.
meanings.sent2: His construal of the poem revealed hidden meanings.
meanings.sent3: The construal of the dog's actions as a dance routine was amusing.
meanings.sent4: In her construal of the music, each note became a color in a painting.
meanings.sent5: The construal of the map as a treasure hunt added excitement to the journey.
